Package: org.grails.datastore.mapping.simpledb.util

[Java] Class DelayAfterWriteSimpleDBTemplateDecorator

    • org.grails.datastore.mapping.simpledb.util.DelayAfterWriteSimpleDBTemplateDecorator
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      SimpleDBTemplate

      public class DelayAfterWriteSimpleDBTemplateDecorator
extends java.lang.Object

      Simple decorator used in testing to fight eventual consistency of SimpleDB.
